text: Hello All- I have a question. I was playing around with a ton of different templates you can download from the marketplace. But now my developer view is cluttered and I really just want to start from scratch. What is the best way to do that? Is there a clean way to restore my Designer Manager files back to the default?
Hey <@ULRB56KFU>. There isn’t a one-click solution that I’m aware of. Have you tried simply deleting the folders that contain the templates you don’t want any longer?
